name: Is the Paschal Lamb contained in a circular cartouche?

children.name: Does a vertical chain line pass through the center of the watermark?
Does the lamb's tail protrude lower than its hind legs?
Does the bottom of the flagpole touch the bottom of the crest?
Are there initials at the base of the shield?
Does the lamb's neck protrude past the nearest central chain line?
Is there a single arch above the shield?
Are the boundaries of the shield warped and not relatively straight?
Does the line descending from the shield’s bottom mantle bend toward the side with the flag?
Is there a bump in the boundary of the crest on the side with the flag?
